mapper.select: select boardno from (select boardno from board where memberno=#{memberno} order by boardno desc) where rownum=1

select a.boardno, a.memberno, a.title, a.category,a.content,a.price, nvl((b.cnt),0)"cnt",d.imagename,e.address,f.wish from board a LEFT JOIN (SELECT boardno,COUNT(distinct(memberno))cnt FROM guest GROUP BY boardno ) b ON a.boardno = b.boardno LEFT JOIN image d ON a.boardno = d.boardno LEFT JOIN member e ON a.memberno = e.memberno LEFT JOIN (SELECT boardno,COUNT(memberno)wish FROM wish group by boardno) f ON a.boardno = f.boardno where d.imageindex = 1 and rownum < 10 order by cnt desc NULLS LAST

select a.boardno,a.memberno,a.title,a.category,a.datetime,a.content,a.price,i.imagename,m.email,m.name,m.profile,m.address,w.wishcount,c.chatcount,nvl((m.viewscount),0)viewscount from board a left join image i on a.boardno=i.boardno left join member m on a.memberno=m.memberno left join (select boardno,count(wishno)wishcount from wish group by boardno) w on a.boardno=w.boardno left join (select boardno,count(chatroomno)chatcount from chatroom group by boardno) c on a.boardno=c.boardno LEFT JOIN (SELECT boardno,COUNT(distinct(memberno))viewscount FROM guest GROUP BY boardno ) m ON a.boardno = m.boardno where a.boardno=#{boardno}
